channel.title: Abouts on Real Charitable Trust
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Real Charitable Trust

item.title: About Us
item.description: Real Charitable Trust was founded on 26th December 2012 by Mr. Lawrence from Vyasarpadi, Chennai. Vision The vision of RCT is to protect human rights and the environment. Mission Support elderly people with basic necessities of life. Empower children to continue primary education and support their health, sports, etc. Protect the environment through Solid Waste Management, afforestation, community cleanliness and hygiene programs. Empower women through Self Help Groups (SHG). Educate and train youth on ethics, values and life skills.
